mapper.select: SELECT strf_id as strfId, categoty , title , lat as latit , lng as longitude address , post , tell , start_at as startAt, end_at , open , close , rest_date as restDate, explain , detail , location_id as locationId, busi_num as busiNum FROM stay_tour_restaur_fest a JOIN location b ON a.location_id = b.location_id JOIN business_num c ON a.busi_num = c.busi_num JOIN wishlist d ON a.strf_id = d.strf_id WHERE strf_id = #{strfId}

SELECT review_id , content , rating , a.user_id , schedule_id , created_at , updated_at , b.profile_pic , b.name , FROM review a JOIN user b ON a.user_id = b.user_id JOIN schedule c ON a.schedule_id = c.schedule_id WHERE review_id = #{reviewId}
